title: Calories in a Cali Burrito
meta_description: Discover calories in cali burrito, including macros like protein, carbs, fat, plus nutrition breakdown and variations for this San Diego-style favorite.
assumptions: Standard 12-inch flour tortilla filled with grilled carne asada (4 oz), french fries (1/2 cup), shredded cheese (1 oz), guacamole (2 tbsp), pico de gallo, sour cream (1 tbsp); no extra sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant, portion size, ingredients, and preparation; values are estimates. Check specific menus or labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard Cali burrito contains about 920 kcal, with 35 g protein and 100 g carbs from tortilla and fries.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged or restaurant info.

tweaks.label: Use chicken instead of carne asada

faqs.q: How many calories in a Cali burrito?
faqs.a: Approximately 920 kcal for a standard version with carne asada and fries.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a Cali burrito?
faqs.a: About 35 g, mainly from the grilled carne asada.

faqs.q: Are Cali burritos high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1500 mg due to cheese, sour cream, and seasonings.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie Cali burrito?
faqs.a: Skip fries or use a whole wheat tortilla to cut ~200 kcal.

faqs.q: What's the carb count in a Cali burrito?
faqs.a: Roughly 100 g, from the tortilla, fries, and veggies.
